mail-template.name: task-assign
mail-template.subject: Task: '#{taskInstance.name} #{taskInstance.variables['token'].displayName}'
mail-template.text: Hi, Task '#{taskInstance.name}' - '#{taskInstance.variables['token'].displayName}' has been assigned to you. You can view it here : http://http://216.254.205.132:8080/trackrite/admin/tasks/viewTask.seam?taskId=#{taskInstance.id} Thanks. -- NAS Team--

mail-template.name: task-reminder
mail-template.subject: Task '#{taskInstance.name}' !
mail-template.text: Hey, Don't forget about #{BaseTaskListURL}#{taskInstance.id} Get going ! ---powered by JBoss jBPM---
